SEARCH
Package database

Class Table

java.lang.Object
database.Table
public class Table extends Object
Represents a table in a database, containing multiple columns and rows.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Table()
    Constructs a new Table with an empty column collection and row list.

    • editCell

      public void editCell(String columnName, int rowIndex, String value)
      Edits the value of a cell in the table.
      Parameters:
      columnName - the name of the column containing the cell.
      rowIndex - the index of the row containing the cell.
      value - the new value for the cell.

    • editColumnName

      public void editColumnName(String oldname, String newName)
      Edits the name of a column in the table.
      Parameters:
      oldname - the current name of the column.
      newName - the new name for the column.
